subject: Please make sure you upload files as mp3 and not wav
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-863588523-1252220484=:94377
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Guys we have limited file storage space on the yahoo group so we have to ei=
ther send files as attachments to an email post, use esnips.com, or submit =
mp3 format only. Wav format will be removed by the mods.
=A0
Esnips will gi=
ve you plenty of storage space and you can upload most file types then shar=
e with group. You are free to share as many files as you want that way.=A0Y=
ahoo doesnt give the groups much space to work with. You can also attach fi=
les to a post. 
=A0
Misty
=A0
=A0
